EDITORIAL OFFICE: Dsedalus, the Journal of the American Academy of Arts
and Sciences, 357 Jefferson Laboratory, Harvard University, Cambridge 38,
Massachusetts. All communications to the Editor should be sent to that address.
PUBLICATION OFFICE: Wesleyan University Press, 356 Washington Street,
Middletown, Connecticut. All business correspondence should be sent to the
Wesleyan University Press. Issued from 1250 Fairwood Ave., Columbus 16, Ohio.
SUBSCRIPTIONS: Dsedalus is published quarterly. Subscription rate in the
U. S. A. $4.50 a year; foreign $5.00; single copies $1.25. Subscription orders
should be sent to the Publication Office, Wesleyan University Press.
